page.title: 01 Local History
page.content: The area that we were assigned to deal with is part of Briton Ferry which was in the past a hive of industrial activity. Some of this history is still evident but unfortunately most of the buildings have been knocked down. Our first impression of the land was dismay! It didnt look a very interesting part to look at. On delving further,however,we discovered quite a lot of interesting aspects. On the map that we were given it shows the site of the old Albion steelworks and the Whitford sheet works.This has now been removed.The land has been generally flattned by the West Glamorgan County council.
